title: Born in the sun
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Fruit trade - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Dried fruit industry - Australia
abstract: Documentary about the dried fruits industry and the importance of irrigation.
description: Shows the development of the dried fruits industry at Mildura from the time of Deakin's irrigation bill, and highlights the part irrigation has played. Includes a dramatised extract of an Alfred Deakin speech. The film shows climatic setbacks which the industry has experienced. Illustrates the harvesting, processing and distribution of the fruit.
